retrieval.indexer

Class RetrievalIndexerLocalStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.indexer.RetrievalIndexer
      • retrieval.indexer.RetrievalIndexerLocalStorage

  • public class RetrievalIndexerLocalStorage
extends RetrievalIndexer
    Retrieval indexer for a local RetrievalServer (a java object). A retrieval indexer can index, delete, get data on a RetrievalServer. The retrieval server must be local (use retrievalServer.getMainStorage())

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RetrievalIndexerLocalStorage(Storage storage, boolean synchronous)
      Build a retrieval index with a local storage The asynchronous mode will be used

      • indexToStorage

        protected java.lang.Long indexToStorage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                        java.lang.Long id,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        NoValidPictureException,
                                        NotValidMessageXMLException,
                                        CBIRException
        This function insert a picture on a CBIR storage
        Specified by:
        indexToStorage in class RetrievalIndexer
        Parameters:
        image - Image to index
        id - Resource id in server
        properties - Properties to store for the image
        Returns:
        Absolute file Path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Cannot make a correct connection with server
        NoValidPictureException - Picture is not a valid image
        NotValidMessageXMLException - Bad message format
        CBIRException - Error from server

      • delete

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CBIRException> delete(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                                          NotValidMessageXMLException,
                                                          CBIRException
        This function delete a list of image on a storage Images are just removed from results, but they are still in index. You need to run purge (VERY HEAVY OP!) when server will not be used (during night,...) to clean all index data.
        Specified by:
        delete in class RetrievalIndexer
        Parameters:
        ids - List of files to delete
        Returns:
        Map with all deleted files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Cannot make a correct connection with server
        NotValidMessageXMLException - Bad message format
        CBIRException - Error from server

      • checkPictures

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CBIRException> checkPictures(java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CBIRException> ids)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                 NotValidMessageXMLException,
                                                                 CBIRException
        This function ask to a server information about indexed pictures on the server
        Specified by:
        checkPictures in class RetrievalIndexer
        Parameters:
        ids - Picture ids
        Returns:
        A map with picture list and their exception (NoException if picture is well indexed)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Cannot make a correct connection with server
        NotValidMessageXMLException - Bad message format
        CBIRException - Error from server
